items.title: Can New Science Slow Aging and Disease Risk?
items.description: Getting older is a part of life, but geroscience aims to modify biological aging, and with it, age-related diseases. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Mpox no Longer an International Health Emergency, Says WHO Chief
items.description: Mpox no longer represents a international health emergency, the World Health Organization chief said on Friday. Reuters Health Information
